/usr/lib/ccache/c++  -fPIC  -Wno-write-strings -Wno-format-security -O3 -DNDEBUG   -shared -Wl,-soname,libdjvPpmPlugin.so -o ../../build/lib/libdjvPpmPlugin.so CMakeFiles/djvPpmPlugin.dir/djvPpmLoad.cpp.o CMakeFiles/djvPpmPlugin.dir/djvPpmPlugin.cpp.o CMakeFiles/djvPpmPlugin.dir/djvPpmSave.cpp.o CMakeFiles/djvPpmPlugin.dir/djvPpmWidget.cpp.o CMakeFiles/djvPpmPlugin.dir/moc_djvPpmWidget.cpp.o ../../build/lib/libdjvGui.so ../../build/lib/libdjvCore.so /usr/lib/libQt5Widgets.so.5.4.1 /usr/lib/libQt5OpenGL.so.5.4.1 /usr/lib/libQt5Core.so.5.4.1 -lIex -lHalf -lImath -lIlmThread -lGLEW -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -ldl /usr/lib/libQt5Widgets.so.5.4.1 /usr/lib/libQt5Gui.so.5.4.1 /usr/lib/libQt5Core.so.5.4.1 -Wl,-rpath,/home/lince/djv-git/build/lib:
